mapper.select: select course_id,t_subject.`name` as 'course_name' , t_exam_schedule.exam_name ,room,start_time,end_time from t_electives,t_exam_schedule,t_subject where t_electives.subject_id = t_exam_schedule.course_id and t_electives.subject_id = t_subject.subject_id and student_id = #{student_id}
